arm_group.description: Patients who underwent 6 mg sumatriptan subcutaneous one time
Patients who underwent 20 mg Metoclopramide intravenous one time

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine which drug makes lower migraine headache

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Metoclopramide Versus Sumatriptan for Emergency Department Treatment of Migraine Headache

detailed_description.textblock:
There are different options to manage benign headache in emergency department.The
      investigators compared Intravenous metoclopramide with Subcutaneous sumatriptan to relieve
      pain in emergency department.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  20-60 years old and presented with acute headache similar to previous episodes,

          -  with or without phonophobia,

          -  photophobia,

          -  vomiting or nausea.

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  fever or neck stiffness,

          -  altered mental state,

          -  pregnancy,

          -  recent trauma or seizure (within 24 hours),

          -  focal neurological abnormality on physical examination,

          -  allergy to metoclopramide,

          -  hypertension,

          -  cardiovascular diseases.

        Also if the patients had taken a triptan or ergot during the last 24 hours were excluded
        from the study.

intervention.description: Sumatriptan, subcutaneous injection, 6 mg, one time

clinical_study.official_title: Study of Effects of Metoclopramide Versus Sumatriptan on Migraine Headache

overall_official.affiliation: Isfahan, Isfahan, Iran, Islamic Republic of

primary_outcome.description: determining pain in Metoclopramide versus sumatriptan groups

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Single Blind (Outcomes Assessor), Primary Purpose: Treatment
